lead_paragraph: Belarus beat the United States, 5-2, for the first time at the hockey world championship in Ostrava, Czech Republic.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; U.S. Loses at World Championship

snippet: Belarus beat the United States, 5-2, for the first time at the hockey world championship in Ostrava, Czech Republic.
abstract: Belarus men's hockey team defeats United States, 5-2, at hockey world championship.
